title: Rito please! D:
body:
So i queue up for a TT flex, go to loadout and then....game crashes repeatedly (sent in error report) and then when it finally lets me in my team had chosen to remake already. My net was working just fine. League was the only thing that was being screwy.
Basically, that caused me to lose (through punishment for something out of my control) a RANKED match. 

{{summoner:3}} End butthurt post

replies.body:
If this was a *Bugsplat*, then this is likely caused by a system driver or hardware issue and I'd recommend resolving this before it becomes a problem again. Our [**Bugsplat Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) covers the most common solutions, so I'd recommend giving those steps a go in order to prevent this from happening again.

Let me know if those steps ended up helping.
